description: Enterprise techniques used by SysUpdate, ATT&CK software S0663 v1.0
name: SysUpdate (S0663)

techniques.comment: [SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can use a Registry Run key to establish persistence.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can create a service to establish persistence.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can deobfuscate packed binaries in memory.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can search files on a compromised host.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) has the ability to set file attributes to hidden.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can load DLLs through vulnerable legitimate executables.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can delete its configuration file from the targeted system.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) has the ability to download files to a compromised host.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)

[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can write its configuration file to Software\Classes\scConfig in either HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE or HKEY_CURRENT_USER.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can encrypt and encode its configuration file.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can use packed binaries.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) has the ability to capture screenshots.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can determine whether a system has a 32 bit or 64 bit architecture.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can manage services and processes.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
[SysUpdate](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0663) can use WMI for execution on a compromised host.(Citation: Trend Micro Iron Tiger April 2021)
